sparklers.name: Sparklers
sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

fountains.name: Fountains
fountains.description: Shoot multi-color sparks several feet in the air, for a dazzling display of light.

2inMortar.name: 2in Mortar
2inMortar.description: The largest bang available for everyone; creates aeral displays.

5inMortar.name: 5in Mortar
5inMortar.description: The standard for aerial displays, comes in random colors.

serialMortar.name: Serial Mortar Cannons
serialMortar.description: A series of 12 interconnected mortar shells set to go off 5 seconds apart.

flameShooter.name: Large Flame-Shooter
flameShooter.description: Perfect Fire effects for sports games and concerts.

10inMortar.name: 10in Mortar
10inMortar.description: Our experimental mortar system.  Use far away from large crowds.

giant-fountain.name: Giant Fountain
giant-fountain.description: Similar effect to the fountains most people are used to, except this one shoots sparks 10 stories high.

city-stopper.name: City Stopper
city-stopper.description: The loudest mortar shell we make. Pauses traffic city-wide for 1 minute.

tnt.name: Simple TNT with Handle and Lever
tnt.description: Dynomite with wires and a box with a push lever.  Standard for any roadrunner hunting.

piano.name: Piano Dropper
piano.description: Put bridseed down, and when the roadrunner stops to eat it, pull the string and drop the piano.  No warrenty on rope trigger.

total-kit.name: Complete roadrunner hunter starter kit.
total-kit.description: The complate entry level road runner hunting kit.  Complete with explosive boulders, levers, pullies, pianos, and, of course, bridseed.

eloborate-tnt.name: Elaborate TNT Device
eloborate-tnt.description: Same power as our standard TNT but with a random elaborate triggering divice custom made by the finest cyote enginneers.

boulders-loaded.name: Loaded Boulders
boulders-loaded.description: When the roadrunner is too smart for the simple boulder and lever, this combines several sequential boulders to fool your prey.

net.name: Simple Net
net.description: This is just a simple net, but because we mis-categorized it, we charge more for it.

seriously.name: Seriously?
seriously.description: I mean come on guys.  Why can't we just get the data from y'all.  It doesn't even have to be in json form.  Give us a damn spreadsheet to copy data from or something like that.  For realz!
